name: 高等生物無機化學特論
description:
1. To have students learn the metalloenzymes.
2. To learn the active site structure of metalloenzymes and their biological functions.
3. To learn the model compounds of metalloenzymes.
4. To learn the catalytic mechanisms of metalloenzymes.
goals: To have students learn the metalloenzymes.
To learn the active site structure of metalloenzymes and their biological functions.
To learn the model compounds of metalloenzymes.
To learn the catalytic mechanisms of metalloenzymes.
syllabus:
1\. Overview of Bioinorganic Chemistry   
2\. Principles of Coordination Chemistry Related to Bioinorganic Research   
3\. Principles of Biological Molecules   
4\. Phyical Methods in Bioinorganic Chemistry   
5\. Electron-Transfer Proteins   
6\. Substrate Binding and Activation by Nonredox Mechanisms   
7\. Atom- and Group-Transfer Chemistry
